amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for business-class or first-class airline travel by employees of the Department of Commerce in contravention.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for business-class or first-class airline travel by employees of the Department of Commerce in contravention.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lampson amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lampson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lampson amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
